definitions.definition: Any semi-aquatic , carnivorous mammal in the Mustelinae subfamily , similar to weasels , with dark fur , native to Europe and America , of which two species in different genera are extant: the American mink ( Neogale vison ) and the European mink ( Mustela lutreola ).
The fur or pelt of a mink, used to make apparel .
An article of clothing made of mink.
A person with poor personal hygiene ; a smelly person.

main_definition: ( plural mink or minks ) Any semi-aquatic , carnivorous mammal in the Mustelinae subfamily , similar to weasels , with dark fur , native to Europe and America , of which two species in different genera are extant: the American mink ( Neogale vison ) and the European mink ( Mustela lutreola ).
secondary_definitions: ( plural mink ) The fur or pelt of a mink, used to make apparel .
( plural minks ) An article of clothing made of mink.
( Scotland , slang , derogatory , plural minks ) A person with poor personal hygiene ; a smelly person.
